54     def _get_launch_args(
55         roles: str = "Instructor",
56         ext_roles: str = "urn:lti:instrole:ims/lis/Instructor",
57         lms_vendor: str = "canvas",
58         oauth_consumer_key: str = "my_consumer_key",
59         oauth_consumer_secret: str = "my_shared_secret",
60         oauth_callback: Optional[str] = "about:blank",
61     ) -> Tuple[str, Dict[str, str], Dict[str, str]]:
62         oauth_timestamp = str(int(time.time()))
63         oauth_nonce = secrets.token_urlsafe(32)
64         args = {
65             "oauth_consumer_key": oauth_consumer_key,
66             "oauth_timestamp": str(int(oauth_timestamp)),
67             "oauth_nonce": str(oauth_nonce),
68             "oauth_signature_method": "HMAC-SHA1",
69             "oauth_version": "1.0",
70             "context_id": "888efe72d4bbbdf90619353bb8ab5965ccbe9b3f",
71             "context_label": "Introduction to Data Science",
72             "context_title": "Introduction101",
73             "course_lineitems": "https://canvas.instructure.com/api/lti/courses/1/line_items",
74             "custom_canvas_assignment_title": "test-assignment",
75             "custom_canvas_course_id": "616",
76             "custom_canvas_enrollment_state": "active",
77             "custom_canvas_user_id": "1091",
78             "custom_canvas_user_login_id": "student1@example.com",
79             "ext_roles": ext_roles,
80             "launch_presentation_document_target": "iframe",
81             "launch_presentation_height": "1000",
82             "launch_presentation_locale": "en",
83             "launch_presentation_return_url": "https://canvas.instructure.com/courses/161/external_content/success/external_tool_redirect",
84             "launch_presentation_width": "1000",
85             "lis_outcome_service_url": "http://www.imsglobal.org/developers/LTI/test/v1p1/common/tool_consumer_outcome.php?b64=MTIzNDU6OjpzZWNyZXQ=",
86             "lis_person_contact_email_primary": "student1@example.com",
87             "lis_person_name_family": "Bar",
88             "lis_person_name_full": "Foo Bar",
89             "lis_person_name_given": "Foo",
90             "lti_message_type": "basic-lti-launch-request",
91             "lis_result_sourcedid": "feb-123-456-2929::28883",
92             "lti_version": "LTI-1p0",
93             "resource_link_id": "888efe72d4bbbdf90619353bb8ab5965ccbe9b3f",
94             "resource_link_title": "Test-Assignment",
95             "roles": roles,
96             "tool_consumer_info_product_family_code": lms_vendor,
97             "tool_consumer_info_version": "cloud",
98             "tool_consumer_instance_contact_email": "notifications@mylms.com",
99             "tool_consumer_instance_guid": "srnuz6h1U8kOMmETzoqZTJiPWzbPXIYkAUnnAJ4u:test-lms",
100             "tool_consumer_instance_name": "myedutool",
101             "user_id": "185d6c59731a553009ca9b59ca3a885100000",
102             "user_image": "https://lms.example.com/avatar-50.png",
103         }
104         if oauth_callback is not None:
105             args["oauth_callback"] = oauth_callback
106         extra_args = {"my_key": "this_value"}
107         headers = {"Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
108         launch_url = "http://jupyterhub/hub/lti/launch"
109 
110         args.update(extra_args)
111 
112         base_string = signature.signature_base_string(
113             "POST",
114             signature.base_string_uri(launch_url),
115             signature.normalize_parameters(
116                 signature.collect_parameters(body=args, headers=headers)
117             ),
118         )
119 
120         client = Client(
121             client_key=oauth_consumer_key, client_secret=oauth_consumer_secret
122         )
123 
124         args["oauth_signature"] = signature.sign_hmac_sha1_with_client(
125             base_string, client
126         )
127         return launch_url, headers, args
